TopicTitle: To the edge of the known kerbal space and back

Articles.Content:
Here is an easy challenge, make it to the edge of Kerbal space and back to Kerbal

easy - 15 fuel modules - mod and stock parts

Medium - 10 fuel modules - stock parts only

HARD - 5 fuel modules - stock parts only

Post screenshots of before launch, mid-orbit, at the edge and back on Kerbal

I will be trying hard myself Good Luck
the blue line you hit after a while of not going in a circle

the blue line you hit after a while of not going in a circle

What blue line?
has anybody ever over shot the moon by miles???
Right now i am flying towards 230+ billion meters mark (for another challenge), and so far no blue lines. I suppose it is much further than that.

I\'m wondering if he\'s just not zooming out far enough to see the orbit around the sun.

Though depending on how you launch it\'s plenty possible to get the green instead.

(This is also a fairly easy challenge, if you have the patience for your craft to return naturally.)
i dont know about you guys but i hit an invisible wall before i get to the sun

i dont know about you guys but i hit an invisible wall before i get to the sun

its in the opposite direction of the sun

my version

(this is your orbit around the sun)
Precisely, zoom out more and you will see all of it.
oh yeah, can you land on the sun?
nope, because right now it\'s not a 'physical' body, but gravity well...thing
